lyrics:
152 contributorstranslationstürkçeespañolрусскийportuguêsहिन्दीpapi’s home lyricsintro drake  montell jordan
i know that i hurt you
yeah

to all my sons worldwide

all my juniors

and now im standing right here
i dont know how i expected you to get your clout up and get your money up but
with tears with tears streaming from my eyes
dont worry
see your mother raised a fine young man
daddys home
and i know i missed so much of your life
turn me up mario

verse drake
yeah
niggas know they need to stop
im standing at the top thats how i know you never seen the top
sierra canyon parking lot lookin like magic city parking lot
hear the talks when i walk by like you know its over when we drop
ayy drop
yeah and im coming with the wop

fuck her then she goin shoppin

put em up for adoption

ayy this is not luck baby this no fourleaf no horseshoe

city coming off a lockdown

ym forever

at this point ima start collectin child support the opposite way

look at me
take a real good look at me

im making no more promises
for real
